_header: Who runneth over sea from place to place
_description: On remaining of same mind in spite of changing place, translating,‘Caelum non animum mutat, qui trans mare currit’ — one couplet

DULCosViii9.Transcription:
Whoo runnethe over see ffrom place to placeThough he chaunge
                        place aire his mind is as yt was
